scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:go
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend/python-api && ( [ -f .venv/bin/ruff ] && .venv/bin/ruff check . || ruff check . ) && ( [ -f .venv/bin/mypy ] && .venv/bin/mypy . || mypy . )
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:go
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:go
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:go
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm run test || echo '⚠️  Frontend tests not yet implemented'
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/python-api && ( [ -f .venv/bin/pytest ] && .venv/bin/pytest || pytest ) || echo '⚠️  Backend tests not yet implemented'
scripts.test:go: cd backend/go-api && go test ./... || echo '⚠️  Go tests not yet implemented'
